languages.text: Until the end of combat, the target of Dispatch loses half of its current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
languages.original_text: До конца боя цель Устранения теряет половину от своих текущих значений {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} урона.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, the target of Dispatch loses half of its current armour and deflection.
Until the end of combat, the target of Dispatch loses half of its current armour and deflection.
Until the end of combat, the target of Dispatch loses half of its current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

languages.text: До конца боя цель Устранения теряет половину от своих текущих значений {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} урона.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the target of Dispatch loses half of its current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя цель Устранения теряет половину от своих текущих значений брони и отражения урона.
До конца боя цель Устранения теряет половину от своих текущих значений брони и отражения урона.

languages.text: 被生机断绝命中的目标会失去一半的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the target of Dispatch loses half of its current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 被生机断绝命中的目标会失去一半的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, el objetivo de Liquidar pierde la mitad de sus puntuaciones actuales de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the target of Dispatch loses half of its current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, el objetivo de Liquidar pierde la mitad de sus puntuaciones actuales de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}.

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes verliert das Ziel von Entledigung die Hälfte seiner aktuellen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the target of Dispatch loses half of its current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes verliert das Ziel von Entledigung die Hälfte seiner aktuellen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, la cible d'Élimination perd la moitié de ses points actuels d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the target of Dispatch loses half of its current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, la cible d'Élimination perd la moitié de ses points actuels d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘終了まで、処刑のターゲットは現在の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}の半分を失う。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the target of Dispatch loses half of its current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了まで、処刑のターゲットは現在の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}の半分を失う。
